title: 의료 윤리 및 환자 권익
intent: 의료 윤리 원칙을 준수하고 환자의 권익을 보호하며 전문적 책임을 다한다.
lexset: ethics, autonomy, beneficence, non-maleficence, justice, consent, confidentiality, privacy, dignity, respect
domain_vocabulary: hippocratic, paternalism, competency, surrogate, advance-directive, DNR, euthanasia, futility, quality-of-life, end-of-life

seeds.en: The physician's duty of beneficence takes precedence.
The principle of non-maleficence is observed.
Medical justice must be applied equitably.

seeds.kr: 생명 연장 치료를 거부할 권리가 있습니다.
seeds.en: There is a right to refuse life-sustaining treatment.
Professional responsibility of healthcare providers is paramount.
